Getting started¶

Installing DSWE package¶

To install DSWE package locally, first clone the repo. The package is in developement mode currently, so checkout the ‘dev’ branch:

> git clone -b dev https://github.com/TAMU-AML/DSWE-Python/

After cloning, install the package using ‘pip’ and set the path to the package directory. All the dependencies require for this package will be installed automatically:

> pip install /DSWE-Python
